Unique Spell Rules

Source Pathfinder #42: Sanctum of the Serpent God pg. 71

Cleric/Warpriest

Accelerate Poison can be prepared as a 2nd-level spell
Beast Shape I can be prepared as a 3rd-level spell [only to take the form of a snake or serpent]
Beast Shape II can be prepared as a 4th-level spell [only to take the form of a snake or serpent]
Beast Shape III can be prepared as a 5th-level spell [only to take the form of a snake or serpent]
Venomous Bolt can be prepared as a 4th-level spell [arrow or bolt appears to be a rigid viper that bites its target with poisoned fangs]

Druid

Venomous Bolt can be prepared as a 4th-level spell [arrow or bolt appears to be a rigid viper that bites its target with poisoned fangs]

Unique Summon Rules

Source Pathfinder #42: Sanctum of the Serpent God pg. 71
Summon Monster II: Venomous Snake [this creature is summoned with the celestial template if you are good, or with the fiendish template if you are evil; you may choose either if you are neutral]
Summon Monster IV: Amphisbaena
Summon Monster V: Emperor Cobra [this creature is summoned with the celestial template if you are good, or with the fiendish template if you are evil; you may choose either if you are neutral]
Summon Monster VII: Giant Anaconda [this creature is summoned with the celestial template if you are good, or with the fiendish template if you are evil; you may choose either if you are neutral]
